ChangeList.Description: Added the following properties to the [alert](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/alert?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity:  **incidentIds**, [securityResources](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/securityResource?view=graph-rest-1.0) - **resource**, **resourceType**,[networkConnection](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/networkconnection?view=graph-rest-1.0) - **sourceLocation**, **destinationLocation**.

The [Update alert](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/alert-update?view=graph-rest-1.0) method now updates the **comments** field with the following values only: ,  **Closed in IPC**, **Closed in MCAS**.

Added the Secure Score APIs to the [security API](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/securescore-api-overview?view=graph-rest-1.0), including the following resources and operations:, [secureScore](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/securescore?view=graph-rest-1.0) (and related entities), [List secureScores](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/securescores-list?view=graph-rest-1.0), [secureScoreControlProfile](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/securescorecontrolprofile?view=graph-rest-1.0), [List secureScoreControlProfiles](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/securescorecontrolprofiles-list?view=graph-rest-1.0), [Update secureScoreControlProfile](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/securescorecontrolprofiles-update?view=graph-rest-1.0)

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: security API,tiindicator,Get tiIndicator,Create tiIndicator,List tiIndicators,Update tiIndicator,Delete tiIndicator,deleteTiIndicators,deleteTiIndicatorsByExternalId,submitTiIndicators,updateTiIndicators
ChangeList.Description: Added the threat intelligence (TI) indicator APIs to the [security API](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/security-api-overview?view=graph-rest-beta), including the following resources and operations:, [tiindicator](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/tiindicator?view=graph-rest-beta) (and related entities),  [Get tiIndicator](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/tiindicator-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [Create tiIndicator](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/tiindicators-post?view=graph-rest-beta), [List tiIndicators](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/tiindicators-list?view=graph-rest-beta), [Update tiIndicator](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/tiindicator-update?view=graph-rest-beta) , [Delete tiIndicator](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/tiindicator-delete?view=graph-rest-beta) , [deleteTiIndicators](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/tiindicator-deletetiindicators?view=graph-rest-beta) , [deleteTiIndicatorsByExternalId](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/tiindicator-deletetiindicatorsbyexternalid?view=graph-rest-beta) , [submitTiIndicators](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/tiindicator-submittiindicators?view=graph-rest-beta) , [updateTiIndicators](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/tiindicator-updatetiindicators?view=graph-rest-beta)
ChangeList.Target: security API,tiindicator,Get tiIndicator,Create tiIndicator,List tiIndicators,Update tiIndicator,Delete tiIndicator,deleteTiIndicators,deleteTiIndicatorsByExternalId,submitTiIndicators,updateTiIndicators

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: security API,securityAction,Get securityAction,Create securityAction,List securityAction,Cancel securityAction
ChangeList.Description: Added the security action APIs to the [security API](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/security-api-overview?view=graph-rest-beta), including the following resources and operations:, [securityAction](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/securityaction?view=graph-rest-beta) (and related entities),  [Get securityAction](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/securityaction-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [Create securityAction](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/securityactions-post?view=graph-rest-beta), [List securityAction](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/securityactions-list?view=graph-rest-beta), [Cancel securityAction](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/securityaction-cancelsecurityaction?view=graph-rest-beta)
ChangeList.Target: security API,securityAction,Get securityAction,Create securityAction,List securityAction,Cancel securityAction

ChangeList.Description: Introduced new complex type [historyStates](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/alerthistorystate?view=graph-rest-beta) collection to alert. </br>Added [updateAlerts](https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/api/alert-updatealerts?view=graph-rest-beta) functionality to update multiple alerts in one request.
